summary: Various photographers and employees of Polaroid recount their experiences with the company's instant film in its final year of production.
cast: Layne Anderson|Sawyer Anderson|Dave Bias|André Bosman|Tod Brilliant|Jackie Neale Chadwick|Jennifer Craig|Marilu Del Prete|Gene Donovan|Simone Frignani|Julia Galdo|Paul Giambarba|Ingrid Giæver|David Hale|Jane Hamilton|Barbara Hitchcock|James Jacobson|Cana Jiang|Bradley 'Buradori' Johnson|Florian Kaps|Ayelet Kindler|Akiko Matsuo|Amane Miura|Lou Noble|Dag Spicer|Kees Teekman|Sean Tubridy|Tomo Umeki|Kim van Groos|Johan Vincentie|John Waters|Dan Weissman|Jane-e Yamamoto
title: Time Zero: The Last Year of Polaroid Film
